column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I can't seem to survive without a weekly deep dish pep delivered to my apartment.  Of course I will visit the restaurant any time I have friends or family in town
column2: love seeing the look on all their faces when they try the best pizza they've probably ever had in their life.  Great outdoor patio to enjoy a few beers while waiting for the pizza.  Super friendly wait staff and delivery staff.
